reviewText:
Early Access Review

Not one thing added or changed to this since coming to STEAM. Obvious it's not going anywhere
and doesn't offer enough content currently to be worth bothering with. Just a gimmick game.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

This game so far is realy nice to play like the Sphere mechanics with these you can build near too all you can imagine and bring it to move :)
Hope the make in the future switches and other triggers to get more out of this nice feature
All in all it feels like a game with huge potential if the devs and the community stick together to polish it
Nice work devs hope there comes more of these ideas and best wishes for success in the future with it
It´s worth the money and also at release now at a low price , so buy it and help the devs the make a big one awesome game out of it

All you need is Fantasy :)
